meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a ghost.
meanings.sent1: The old, abandoned house had a ghosty feeling to it.
meanings.sent2: The fog made the forest look ghosty and mysterious.
meanings.sent3: The ghosty costume made everyone at the party jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her pale, ghosty face in the mirror startled her.
meanings.sent5: The ghosty shadows danced on the wall, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or qualities of a ghost.
meanings.sent1: The ghosty figure floated silently through the room.
meanings.sent2: The ghosty sound of footsteps echoed in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent3: The ghosty cat prowled around the house, scaring the mice.
meanings.sent4: Her ghosty whisper sent shivers down his spine.
meanings.sent5: The ghosty mist enveloped the graveyard, hiding the tombstones from view.
